post:
Hello!

We are offering high-performance VPS/VDS on the latest Intel Core i9 11900K processor which is overclocked to 5.3GHz under water cooling. Thanks to the i9, Windows graphics is much more responsive than on Intel Xeon server processors.

There are available both daily and longer terms of 1/3/6/12 months payment options.

Unlike the most hosting services, we aren't over-sell RAM and disk space.

We use only own equipment from leading manufacturers. Our infrastructure is located in the data center at Kyiv, Leontovicha 9.
There is DDoS protection add-on available for VPS.

Order i9 11900K powered VPS

https://hostiko.com.ua
